thread.title: National Association of Professional Women Inducts Rose Bambao, Administrative Assistant at Exponent, Inc., Into its VIP Woman of the Year Circle
thread.title_full: National Association of Professional Women Inducts Rose Bambao, Administrative Assistant at Exponent, Inc., Into its VIP Woman of the Year Circle

author: Lisa Mancuso
title: National Association of Professional Women Inducts Rose Bambao, Administrative Assistant at Exponent, Inc., Into its VIP Woman of the Year Circle
text:
The National Association of Professional Women (NAPW) honors Rose Bambao as a 2015-2016 inductee into its VIP Woman of the Year Circle. She is recognized with this prestigious distinction for leadership in business. NAPW is the nation’s leading networking organization exclusively for professional women, boasting more than 700,000 members and over 200 operating Local Chapters. “I’m pleased to welcome Rose into this exceptional group of professional women,” said NAPW President Star Jones. “Her knowledge and experience in her industry are valuable assets to her company and community.”
Mrs. Bambao is an Administrative Assistant for Exponent, Inc., a scientific and engineering firm with over 90 disciplines in each field. In the 12 years since joining the firm, Mrs. Bambao has demonstrated an unwavering ability to uphold office efficiency and productivity with her multifaceted skills.
“Every day is challenging with the variety of tasks and obstacles,” said Mrs. Bambao. “What I find rewarding is being able to collaborate with a team to complete the tasks and projects on time.”
In her administrative function, Mrs. Bambao uses her seasoned interpersonal and communications skills to welcome clients and visitors in person and on the phone. She is responsible for scheduling meetings and managing all conference calls, video conferencing, conference rooms, visitor offices and catering events.
Mrs. Bambao ensures that only the highest standards of office safety and maintenance are met. She plays an integral part in forecasting the best plan of action to complete both short- and long-term goals of the firm by gathering weekly administrative task and project projections from the office and initiating administrative team meetings.
Among these noted accomplishments, Mrs. Bambao is an Independent Managing Consultant for Zurvita, Zeal for Life , an advanced nutritional product in the health and wellness industry. She is an active volunteer for the Community Emergency Response Team in Vallejo, CA, and the President of the NAPW Napa Valley Chapter.
About NAPW
NAPW’s mission is to provide an exclusive, highly advanced networking forum to successful women executives, professionals and entrepreneurs where they can aspire, connect and achieve. Through innovative resources, unique tools and progressive benefits, professional women interact, exchange ideas, advance their knowledge and empower each other.
